name: B-1
description:
---- Note -----

There is currently a bug that will crash the game in the second room. Please keep the mouse off the screen in the second room in the game. This is the old room you'll see once you acquire your flashlight.

Synopsis

A home is where the heart is. It's where you hang your hat
and enjoy a peaceful respite away from the toils of every day life.
Everything neatly kept above the surface in a place of happiness.

But what lies below, in the dark? What's beneath those old wooden floor
boards, creaking under the weight of human toil?

I'm not sure myself; I didn't want to find out. But --
